Find local trails. Go outside.

Your Source for NY Trail Information

Looking for a local trail to ride a bike? A mountain to hike?

On this site, you'll find guides to upstate New York trails so you can get outside. While we've started the majority of current listings in the Capital Region and southern Adirondacks, we're planning to expand this resource to other areas of the state. Let us know about trails you'd like to see featured here!
